Participant.title: Participant
Participant.description: Represents a participant in the congress.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Participant (Firebase Auth UID).

photoURL.description: URL of the participant's profile picture.

digitalCredentialQR.description: Data for the QR code, which is the user's UID.

points.description: Total gamification points earned by the participant.

role.description: The role of the user, e.g., 'alumno' or 'admin'.

CongressEvent.title: Congress Event
CongressEvent.description: Represents a single event within the congress.

id.description: Unique identifier for the event (used for the QR code).

title.description: The official title of the event.

description.description: A detailed description of the event.

dateTime.description: The start date and time of the event in ISO 8601 format.

location.description: The location where the event will take place.

imageUrl.description: A URL for a promotional image for the event.

Attendance.title: Attendance Record
Attendance.description: Records a participant's attendance at a specific congress event.

participantId.description: The ID of the participant who attended.

eventId.description: The ID of the event that was attended.

timestamp.description: The time the attendance was recorded.

definition.description: Collection to store participant profile data. User ID is the Firebase Auth UID.
Collection to store all congress events.
Subcollection to store attendance records for a specific user.
